text: The entire soundtrack of this game is incredible. If you buy the OST, it's mixed seamlessly as an album so you can listen to the whole thing in one go for a long unified emotional experience. No joke, I cried at the end.
author: Kasran Fox

text: This is really good dark ambient music.
author: MantiaRyche

text: Probably my favorite track from this game. It took a while to grow on me, but I absolutely love the ambience and atmosphere, all the little touches throughout.

text: Not too much melody in this one, but just like the rest of the superb soundrack, it oozes atmosphere. I remember this part in the prison and with this music, I stood still for a while and everything simply felt perfect.

text: +SupraDarky I really liked this game, especially its atmosphere and setting. But I still can't wait for Gorogoa.
